original_text: And the servants of the master of the house came and said to him, ‘Master, did you not sow good seed in your field? How then does it have weeds?’
korean_text: 집 주인의 종들이 와서 말하되 주여 밭에 좋은 씨를 뿌리지 아니하였나이까 그런데 가라지가 어디서 생겼나이까

sentences.original_text: And the servants of the master of the house came
did you not sow good seed in your field?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 밭에 좋은 씨를 뿌리지 아니하였나이까?

sentences.original_text: How then does it have weeds?’
